title: Dazzling Ray
content:
the Fabricated Arbalest item, but only the weapon action is given, not the class action. Dazzling Ray woks the same as Sunbeam, just with less damage and with a chance to damage the caster. Like many unique versions of spells given by weapons, it incorrectly states that you need to be proficient in the weapon to use it, you don't. The weapon can be equipped by anyone and the action used.

All Actions in Baldur's Gate 3 Aberrant Shape ♦ Abjure Enemy ♦ Absolute Power ♦ Absorb Elements (Reaction)
